text.section:
Money payments and special services under the adoption subsidy program shall be funded by:
appropriations to a local department for the maintenance of children in foster care; and
money that is made available to a local department from other sources.

Medical assistance and medical care under the adoption subsidy program shall be funded by:
savings for the fiscal year by the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene and the Department of Human Resources that are attributable to adoptions under this subtitle; and
appropriations to the Department of Human Resources for the adoption subsidy program.
The Administration may reimburse the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene for the cost of medical assistance and medical care directly or through a contract with the Department.
